attributes.additional_details:
It is not fair that people under 35. the young people who may not be able to gain work because of certain issues such as speech impairment (me) etc have to find a shared flat for £90 a week because if any can tell me were you find a place for £90 a week then good luck.

An example is if the person your living with is drinking or doing drugs. and you are not workling (and how many jobs are out there at the moment) and you want to find for a work or improve on your life then how is this meant to help the young people.

I want the goverment to rethink what they are doing and  at least pay £150 a week or full housing . young people are the further of the UK and your making it hard on them to find work and housing.

If the hosuing is a bit more than aleast landlords could rent out more places around the UK. and then the government will not deal with so many people under £35.
